## BundledCode.(constructor)

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Bundles given functions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(...functionOptions: FunctionOptions[]);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  functionOptions | [FunctionOptions](./cdk-cloudfront-function-bundle.functionoptions.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Functions composing the CloudFront Function. |

## Exceptions

RangeError

If `functionOptions` is empty, or if there is a duplicate handler in `functionOptions`<!-- -->.
